name: Cold Sun Surf
description:
Collect as much money as you can before you are sucked into our terrible dark sun.

Collect fuel as well. You cannot fly if you run out. You know this.

Your body will die but you will have treasure.

*********

This entire code for this game fits in 1k.

Created for PICO-1K Jam 2022 in Pico-8 version 8_0.2.5c.

Full 1016 compressed byte source code here.

Annotated source code (with white space and lots of comments) can be found here.
